Sentencas: Dense membranes of ceramic oxygen ion conductors are of great interest because of their ability to transmit high oxygen fluxes with total selectivity.
Titulo: Ceramic ion conducting membranes and their technological applications

Sentencas: These membranes may be solid electrolytes exhibiting negligible electronic conductivity, or mixed ionic-electronic conductors.
Titulo: Ceramic ion conducting membranes and their technological applications

Sentencas: Parameters controlling the ionic fluxes are outlined, and the factors influencing material selection for a variety of applications are also summarised.
Titulo: Ceramic ion conducting membranes and their technological applications

Sentencas: These applications include solid oxide fuel cells operating on natural gas, devices to generate oxygen from air, and reactors designed to produce hydrogen and syngas by the partial oxidation of methane.
Titulo: Ceramic ion conducting membranes and their technological applications
